actions.desc: The miremal makes two attacks, one of which must be a claw attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: The miremal spews a noxious stream of bog filth mixed with stomach acid at a target up to 20 feet away. Target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1d4 rounds.
actions.name: Bog Spew (Recharge 5-6)

reactions.desc: If an attack would reduce the miremal's hit points to 0, it collapses into a pool of filth-laden swamp water and its hit points are reduced to 1 instead. The miremal can move at its normal speed in this form, including moving through spaces occupied by other creatures. As a bonus action at the beginning of the miremal's next turn, it can reform, still with 1 hit point.
reactions.name: Muddled Escape (1/Day)

special_abilities.desc: The miremal can breathe air and water.
special_abilities.name: Amphibious

special_abilities.desc: The miremal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.
special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage

special_abilities.desc: If the miremal surprises a creature, it gets a bonus action it can use on its first turn of combat for a claw attack, a bite attack, or a Bog Spew attack.
special_abilities.name: Savage Move
